entities.description: Neville is a student who is struggling in Transfiguration. He is described as looking miserable and muttering something about his grandmother wanting him to continue with the subject.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall

entities.name: longbottom
entities.description: Longbottom is a student who received an 'Acceptable' grade in Transfiguration, which Professor McGonagall deemed insufficient for continuing at the N.E.W.T. level.
